Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Appreciable \Ap*pre"ci*a*ble\, a. [Cf. F. appr['e]ciable.] Capable of being appreciated or estimated; large enough to be estimated; perceptible; as, an appreciable quantity. -- {Ap*pre"ci*a*bly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
appreciably adv : to a noticeable degree; "they weather was appreciably colder"
